message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a price that I think is very competitive. I believe it's worth a lot more to me than to you, so I'm willing to make a reasonable offer. I'd like to offer it to you for $18,000.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm not sure I'm comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe the product will bring to me.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12,000. I think the product has a lot of value to offer, and I'd like to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $15,000.
